title: Partners in Crime
description: Who would lead the heist? Who would get caught first? A deck for the adventurous and the rebellious.

cards.content: Most likely to accidentally join a cult?
Most likely to start a cult?
Most likely to fake their own death to escape debt?
Most likely to be the getaway driver?
Most likely to snitch on the group for a lighter sentence?
Most likely to get arrested for doing something incredibly stupid?
Most likely to survive a police interrogation without cracking?
Most likely to be an international spy?
Most likely to hack into a government database?
Most likely to marry a stranger for a visa/citizenship?
Most likely to sneak into a music festival without paying?
Most likely to talk their way out of a speeding ticket?
Most likely to flirt with a police officer to get out of trouble?
Most likely to get caught because they were live-streaming the crime?

Most likely to dine and dash?
